titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 376) to amend the Communications Satellite Act of 1962 to promote competition and privatization in satellite communications, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-514, by Mr. Linder.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 376. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 172.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 439, H. Res. 432 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 3/8/2000--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 376 (promoting competition and privatization in satellite communications).
